original_text: There shall be a great cry throughout all the land of Egypt, such as there has never been, nor ever will be again.
korean_text: 애굽 온 땅에 전무후무한 큰 부르짖음이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: There shall be a great cry throughout all the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 온 땅에 큰 부르짖음이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: such as there has never been, nor ever will be again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 부르짖음은 전에는 없었고, 후에도 없으리라
